alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County West; Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:10AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Imperial and Riverside Counties through 400 AM PDT... At 310 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Desert Shores to Desert Center. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chiriaco Summit, Salton City, Desert Center, North Shore, Salton Sea Beach, Desert Shores, Cottonwood Visitor, Eagle Mtn, and Coolidge Springs. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 74 and 111. CA Route 111 between mile markers 61 and 65. CA Route 86 between mile markers 56 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County West; Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West; Salton Sea
